::FireBlade::
FireBlade takes the wielder from SwitchBlade and begins work. He 
slowly starts to draw up new plans for a blade.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ::Switchblade::
> 
> 	As Fireblade arrives Switchblade comes out of his dreaming, 
> "Fireblade hand me the sword when you're done with it, I've got 
> some time while the reprogramation process works it's magic." He 
> hands his energon welder to Fireblade.
> 
> 
> On 23 Apr 2001, at 5:13, gunthers8@n... wrote:
> 
> > ::FireBlade::
> > FireBlade complies without answering knowing that SwitchBlade 
will 
> > not want interruptions. He walks to the lab and begins his own 
work 
> > of crafting his blade. 
> > "I just need you to do the final circuty" he sias
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > > ::Switchblade::
> > > 	Switchblade puts Condor onto his makeshift table. He draws 
> > > out his laser pistol, and presses a button on the side. The 
> > pistol's 
> > > handle folds into its body, and its end extends a bit. A bright 
> > white 
> > > light comes out of the end about one inch long. Switchblade 
> > > clamps Condor's arms, legs, and torso to the table. He pulls a 
> > > machine over to Condor's head, attaches electrodes and such to 
> > > the sides of Condor's temples and begins reprograming the bot. 
> > > Then he recieves the comm from Fireblade. 
> > > 	"Fireblade, I am in my lab right now, you can come down here. 
> > > The reprograming of Condor has begun," the commlink closes, and 
> > > he laughs to himself, rubbing his hands together.
> > 
> >
